Vamprah::

The femme fell in sinlence a while and she spoke again continued her 
story "in spite of my hide-place, Predacon council, follow my trace 
and Maximals started suspect that a Predacon was hidden there. I ran 
away again and I did the first mistake: come back to Cybertron"

"They expected that and hunt started again with fury. Under Cybertron 
surface existed severals tunnel and caves... most of them exist since 
The GReat War, I tried to reach them but they were watting me. I 
could escape again but in spite of that after several days they 
caught me"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Vamprah::
> 
> "Well... " said the femme "I don't like give you all details about 
my 
> story, it could be a bit bored; maybe your boss will want to know 
it 
> when he knows that I'm here."
> 
> "My ex-boss was becoming a pest to Predacon coouncil, 'cause he was 
> enough unscrupolous to steal Predacons' Protophorms and Weapons of 
> Predacon Army too."Continued Vamprah "And they decided end with us 
> forever... and they prepared a tramp where he and almost all of his 
> followers dead... I was able to scape, but the hunt was starting; 
who 
> didn't death in ambush start to dead later. Predacon council had 
been 
> identify us and slowly was hunting us. Then and I had the need to 
> find a hide-place... And I found it in the last place where they 
> would search me... The biggest Maximal Colony near at Cybertron, 
The 
> colony Alpha Trion... "
> 
> "I hope that you don't think that I'm a betrayer, 'cause that..." 
> said Vamprah while she looked to DevilDuel waitting to see his 
> reaction.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::DevilDuer::
> > 
> > DevilDuer nods. This sounded a bit familiar to him. He could have 
> > sworn that he's heard of something like that before.
> > 
> > "Allright," he says, motioning for her to continue.

follow

> my

> > > several of his plans: Steal information,  keep an eye when they 
> were
